name: meXem
description:
meXem a game by jrbllo and matheuss

- CREDITS

    - Coding = jrbllo

    - Arts = matheuss - https://www.instagram.com/matheuss.design/

    - m5x7 and m6x11 fonts = Daniel Linssen - https://managore.itch.io

    - Grass and water assets = Shaun Spalding - http://shaunspalding.co.uk

    - Moonlight = Maliciou - https://soundcloud.com/maliciou

- CONTROLS

    - A/left arrow key = move character to its left

    - D/right arrow key = move character to its right

    - Left mouse button = fire/menu select

    - Mouse = aim

    - ESC = pause

    - ALT + ENTER = switch fullscreen

this game was created for MiniJam 111 by jrbllo and matheuss.

we are a two friends from Brazil attempting our first game jam.

thx for playing our game!
